New Records: Ceddanne Rafaela hit his first career home run in MLB.
Key Match Events: Ceddanne Rafaela hit a 400-foot leadoff home run against Carlos Rodón.
New York Yankees won game one of Tuesday's double-header to snap a seven-game losing streak against Boston.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ceddanne Rafaela did the 'Ice in my veins' celebration after his home run.
The home run was Rafaela's first career at-bat against the Yankees.
